description:
This pack contains 5 songs from the Naruto and Naruto Shippuden animes, which can be used to change the battle background music, and in-game customization items. 

Songs: 
• Haruka Kanata / ASIAN KUNG-FU GENERATION
• GO!!! / FLOW
• Blue Bird / Ikimonogakari
• Silhouette / KANA-BOON
• Kaze／Yamazaru

Items:
• Substitution Item: Microphone
• Substitution Item: Orange Headphones
• Ninja Info Card Skin: Nostalgic Anime Song Skin
name: NBUNSC - Nostalgic Anime Song & Item Pack
